import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products = productsData; properties = ["Vegan", "Gluten free", "Organic"]; manufacturers = ["Company A", "Company B", "Company C"]; selectedProperties = []; selectedManufacturer = ""; }
